channel.title: Need code so people cant use magic on any pnc
channel.description:
people keep using ancient and normal magic on pncs. I need code so they are not able to mage pncs.
Everytime they do laggs the server and crashes it and also mvoes the pncs.

item.title: Need code so people cant use magic on any pnc
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

Well, since you’re wanting certain npcs not to be attacked. Set their hp to zero, then you’ll have to do something like this in your magic on npcs packet.

if (EnemyHP == 0) { TurnPlayerTo(EnemyX, EnemyY); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; sendMessage("You cannot attack this npc."); return; }

If you don’t have those variables, just add this at the top of the packet.

int EnemyX2 = server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].absX; int EnemyY2 = server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].absY; int EnemyHP2 = server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].HP;
